content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At the early stages of working at the company, we help employees to become familiar with the main processes adopted by EPAM and within DSED.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The HR team supports employees throughout all stages of work and creates favorable conditions for working and getting involved in the life of the department - if you have any questions, you can always contact your HR, ask for advice or suggestions:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":110615,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/68566e64-9acc-48ee-b48a-a0bf2bd22ea2/7.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/68566e64-9acc-48ee-b48a-a0bf2bd22ea2/7.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"7.PNG\",\"name\":\"7.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"68566e64-9acc-48ee-b48a-a0bf2bd22ea2\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":282,\"height\":387},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"There are HR Contacts in every location, to see yours - refer to HR Contacts widget in \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://telescope.epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Telescope\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Your primary HR is marked with a star:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":50039,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/51a0f8a9-fb94-416b-bad1-8e64641b8f1e/8.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/51a0f8a9-fb94-416b-bad1-8e64641b8f1e/8.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"8.PNG\",\"name\":\"8.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"51a0f8a9-fb94-416b-bad1-8e64641b8f1e\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":433,\"height\":431.00000000000006},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
